headlines.title: Thank You For the Music: Looking Back on Cornelius' "Fantasma"
headlines.author: Peter Holsin
headlines.lede: In the wake of the 'Fantasma' reissue, Peter Holslin reminds us why Cornelius is great.

headlines.title: "I'm Looking for a More Psychedelic Directness": An Interview With High Water
headlines.author: Will Schube
headlines.lede: Will Schube and Will Epstein talk about loving Kanye West, making music with friends, and underlying qualities in heroes.

headlines.title: "Just What You Mean": An Interview With Ed Balloon
headlines.author: Evan Gabriel
headlines.lede: Evan Gabriel talks to Ed Balloon about growing up in Boston, finding positivity in rejection, and making the most of meetings with guidance counselors.

headlines.title: The Rap Up for the Week of July 1
headlines.author: Torii Macadams
headlines.lede: The Rap Up featuring Schoolboy Q, Mick Jenkins, The Outfit Tx, Kanye & Fiend

headlines.title: Rap, Reggae, and the West Indian Diaspora in New York
headlines.author: Abe Beame
headlines.lede: Get ready for New York's J'ouvert festival with this excellent mix and history from Abe Beame.
